hero.brandIntro: - freshly ground coffee that's missing on the market
hero.subtitle: and earn from 250 thousand CZK monthly

about.title: About the KÁVES brand
about.description: KÁVES is a proud Czech company bringing self-service coffee stations. Premium, freshly ground coffee from our own Czech roastery, modern design and operation without employees. Everything we produce with emphasis on quality, tradition and honest Czech work.

vendingMachines.title: Vending machines
vendingMachines.subtitle: Vending machines are outdated, use powder and are not able to provide a quality drink
disadvantages: Use questionable ingredients and low-quality, tasteless coffee powder
No uniqueness - similar machines are on every corner

kaves.title: KÁVES
kaves.subtitle: Be your own barista - prepare your own coffee using syrups and toppings
advantages: New market format and premium design
Excellent taste of freshly roasted coffee beans from Czech roastery
Payment is made through card/mobile payments

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Launch your business in 30 days with full support at all stages! We have all steps carefully thought out, solved and ready for immediate launch.

steps.title: Contact us
steps.description: Fill out the contact form or call us. We'll be happy to introduce you to our offer.

steps.title: Consultation
steps.description: We'll arrange a personal meeting where we'll present you the details.

steps.title: Location selection
steps.description: We'll help you choose a suitable location for your coffee shop.

steps.title: Training and preparation
steps.description: We'll guide you through training and preparation for coffee shop operation.

steps.title: Coffee shop opening
steps.description: Grand opening of your new coffee shop with our support.

forEveryone.title: Business for everyone
categories: For anyone interested in additional stable income

whatYouGet.title: What will you get?
items: Self-service coffee machine with premium appearance
